CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Referral_Partner_ID__c ) , null , HYPERLINK( 'http://www.solutionreach.com/COMPANY/Partner-Affiliate-Links?affid=Affiliate-DR&affname=' & Referral_Partner_ID__c , 'http://www.solutionreach.com/COMPANY/Partner-Affiliate-Links?affid=Affiliate-DR&affname=' & Referral_Partner_ID__c ))
CustomField.label: Assets Link
